mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.offer_id AS "offerId", a.user_id AS "userId", a.if_select AS "ifSelect", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.enable_flag AS "enableFlag"
mapper.select: select from ho_snatch_offer a where a.offer_id=#{offerId} and a.user_id=#{userId} and a.enable_flag='1'
select from ho_snatch_offer a where a.offer_id=#{offerId} and a.enable_flag='1'
select from ho_snatch_offer a where a.offer_id=#{offerId} and a.enable_flag='1' and a.if_select='1'

select b.id as 'id', '1' as 'type', b.wx_name as 'wxName', b.avatar_url as 'headPic', d.dict_value as 'platName', c.fans_nums as 'fansNums', b.gender as 'sex' from ho_snatch_offer a left join ho_user_basic b on b.id=a.user_id left join ho_user_star c on c.user_id=a.user_id left join ho_dict d on d.id=c.platform_id where a.offer_id=#{offerId} order by a.create_date desc
